about_restaurant: The Usmania Group of Companies, since its inception in 2006, has firmly established itself as a significant market player in the restaurant and amusement park industry in Pakistan and offers the finest standard in Full Service Dining, coupled with breathtaking locales and ambiance, premium-grade cuisine and World Class Service levels. The ethos at the heart of the business strives to provide high-quality dining and entertainment experiences to the Pakistani public and the words of the Founder & CEO, “Turning Moments into Lifelong Memories”. This vision allows The Monal to consistently provide the highest service standards and stand out as the benchmark in the industry. The Flagship Enterprise of the Group is the Monal Restaurant at Pir Sohawasince its launch in 2006, which has become the iconic identity of Islamabad.
